module.name: class_of_composition_of_product
module.keywords: application, module, composition, whole-part, class, product, process plant

purpose.P: The Class of composition of product application module supports the requirement to record classes of whole-part relationship between classes of product.
The nature of a whole-part relationship between individual products may be specified by indicating a class of composition of which it is a member.

example.P: 'Centrifugal pump' is a class of product. 'Impeller' is a class of product. The relationship between 'centrifugal pump' and 'impeller', that indicates a centrifugal pump has an impeller, is a class_of_composition_of_product.

Pump model XYZ_123 is a class of product. Impeller model I_123/A is a class of product. The relationship between pump model XYZ_123 and impeller model I_123/A, that indicates a pump model has an impeller of the type, is a class_of_composition_of_product.
At an instant in time, a pump of model XYZ_123 has 0 or 1 impeller of type I_123/A. An impeller of type I_123/A is a member of 0 or 1 pump of model XYZ_123.

note.P: The cardinality for the relationship is within the scope of the Cardinality of relationship application module.

LI.P: a mapping between one class of product and another that indicates the nature of a whole-part relationship between two individual products.

note.P: A whole-part relationship between individual products is within the scope of the Composition of individual product application module.

LI.P: membership of a class of composition of product;

note.P: Membership of a class of composition of product is within the scope of the Product structure and classification application module.

LI.P: class of whole-part relationship between activities;
class of whole-part relationship between documents;
class of whole-part relationship between organizations.

uof.name: Class_of_composition_of_product
uof.description: The Class_of_composition_of_product UoF identifies a class of composition of product and defines the classes of product for the whole and part.
